name: Super Virtual Millionaire
description:
Welcome to Super Virtual Millionaire, where you must answer all 15 questions correctly to win 10 Million Points! Think you got what it takes to reach the big jackpot?

This is a fan-made game from the show, "Who wants to be a Millionaire?" by Celador.

But this time, you have 5 answers to choose from. There is one right answer and 4 wrong answers. So be careful when giving an answer to a question!

You have 3 lifelines to help you out, and you can walk away from any question to keep your score, unless you can not lose any points. But be careful, one wrong answer ends the game, and your score drops to the last milestone you have reached.

If you have a computer, press the "F" key to enable Full-Screen Mode.

If you are on the Full-Screen mode, and you want to get back to the normal screen, simply press "esc" on your keyboard.

I would recommend not cheating, for it defeats the purpose of this game, and it ruins the fun.

Have fun, and tell me in the comments what score you got!!
